place.placeName: Koholo Qǝddus Yoḥannǝs Däbrä Betel / Koholo Qǝddus Yoḥannǝs Däbrä Gälila
place.settlement: wäräda ʾƎndärta, ṭabiya May ʾAnbäsa, qušät Koholo

note.ab: Däbr. Most probably, a monastic community existed here in the past, and heremits lived in the area around. One ruined rock-hewn church, with remains of paintings, is located in the rock under the main church of John the Baptist. Tabots (at least 12, 7 of them marble): Michael, Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus, 3 of Mary, Mädḫane ʿAläm, John the Baptist, ʾabunä ʾAbrǝham, Jesus (ʾAnanya in a small church in the vicinity; other tabots in small associated churches around).

71 Mss. photographed: KY-001 "The Vita of the Martyrs"; KY-002 "Ochtateuch"; KY-003 "Synaxarion (the first half of the year)"; KY-004 "Four Gospels"; KY-005 "Four Gospels"; KY-006 "The Faith of the Fathers"; KY-007 "Collection of texts devoted to John the Baptist"; KY-008 "Missal"; KY-009 "Miracles of Jesus"; KY-010 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; KY-011 "Psalter"; KY-012 "Texts devoted to John the Baptist";
